trans_title: 少年烘焙大赛 第六季
introduction: The sixth series of Junior Bake Off began on 11 January 2021, with 16 contestants competing to be crowned the series 6 winner. The bakers were divided into two groups of 8, with four eliminated from each group over five days of competition. The remaining four bakers from each group were combined in the week-long finals, culminating in a "super-difficult showdown" episode that determines the winner. Reece won the 2021 series.
chinese_title: 少年烘焙大赛 第六季
